samples.question: [Transcript chunk 10]
samples.transcript: Talking it does not feel like you have you are having trouble to pronounce anything so you are definitely easy to understand throughout the only thing that i would say that you you kind of sound a little bit monotone here and there right so try to bring up a little bit more ups and downs in there maybe it is because you are nervous i understand that definitely but pay a little bit more attention to that I am pretty sure you do not know how to do that or you can try i do not know this is always for example this mirroring method where you can just listen to something in english and then repeat exactly what they are saying and try to imitate the intonation there and then you can kind of adapt to that right and also i think in this case it would help if you know just speak up a little bit be more confident because you know what you are doing so you can be confident about it and i think that shows in your voice as well okay and then if you do have if you do notice that you are making some mistakes maybe try to slow down here and there so you are talking rather fast which is normally okay because you know what you are doing but maybe in the exam try to slow down a little bit take your time and that is going to get you through without major mistakes okay and then one more thing that i noticed you were talking very colloquial right and you were saying things like kind of want to things like that you should not do that in an in the ielts exam right that is considered that is considered a mispronunciation so pay attention to that.
